statements: DELETE FROM LivestockFeedData WHERE ID = 1 AND LivestockName = 'Cow';
DELETE FROM LivestockFeedData WHERE Quantity > 1000 AND DateRecorded < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM feed_data WHERE protein_content < 10 AND carbohydrate_content > 20;
DELETE FROM group_livestock WHERE group_name = 'Cattle Group';
DELETE FROM feed_data WHERE protein_content < 10 AND energy_content < 50;
DELETE FROM Nutrition WHERE quantity < 100 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Livestock WHERE breed = 'Angus' OR age > 5;
